description: This file defines the NoteEditActivity class for an Android application, responsible for creating and editing notes. It manages user input, interactions with the NoteRepository, and UI component setup.

classes.name: NoteEditActivity
classes.description: An Android Activity class facilitating creation and editing of notes, with UI components for title and content, and buttons for save and delete operations.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method initializing UI components, loading existing note data if available, and setting up button click listeners for saving or deleting notes.
